attributes.action: Change the boundary so that Wigan is back in Lancashire
attributes.additional_details: Change the boundaries back such that the Wigan borough is in Lancashire, not Greater Manchester
attributes.background: Many people do not agree with the boundary changes, which we had no say in. Wigan is a chartered town, older than Manchester and we want to be back in Lancashire where we belong.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

This would be a matter for Wigan Metropolitan Borough Council and the Greater Manchester Combined Authority.

You can find out how to petition Wigan Council at this address:
https://democracy.wigan.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
